headline: Intuit’s AI Construction ERP Targets Mid Market And Enterprise Ambitions
summary: Intuit (NasdaqGS:INTU) has launched an AI native Construction Edition of its Enterprise Suite. This is the company’s first industry specific ERP solution, focused on mid market construction businesses. The product targets workflow automation, real time performance insights, project management agents and advanced integrations. For investors watching Intuit’s move beyond its core tax and accounting tools, the Construction Edition signals a push deeper into enterprise software tied to specific...
